fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Attack a player during the night. In addition, check the target chain originating from them (who the target visited, who that person visited, etc.). The attack tier is equal to the number of Striked players in that chain.
-Check a playerâ€™s chain during the night. If it is at least 4 players long without counting loops, gain a Strike. You will know who is in the chain.
-Prepare a Strike on a player. Strikes will activate the following morning.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If two or more Striked players are alive, gain basic defense.
-If three or more Striked players are alive, your attack will hit the second player in the chain with an attack tier 1 less than the first.
